data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: The San Francisco International Film Festival, founded by Irving "Bud" Levin started in 1957, is the oldest continuously annual film festival in the United States. It ____ current ____ in ____ filmmaking ____ video ____ with ____ emphasis ____ work ____ has ____ yet ____ U.S. ____. The Toronto International Film Festival, founded by Bill Marshall, Henk Van der Kolk and Dusty Cohl, is regarded as North America's most major and most prestigious film festival, and is the most widely attended.
data.partBlankContent: The San Francisco International Film Festival, founded by Irving "Bud" Levin started in 1957, is the oldest continuously annual film festival in the United States. It highl_____ current tre___ in intern_______ filmmaking a__ video produ_____ with a_ emphasis o_ work th__ has n__ yet sec____ U.S. distri______. The Toronto International Film Festival, founded by Bill Marshall, Henk Van der Kolk and Dusty Cohl, is regarded as North America's most major and most prestigious film festival, and is the most widely attended.
data.answer: 旧金山国际电影节由Irving“Bud”Levin创立于1957年，是美国历史最悠久的连续举办的年度电影节。它强调了当前国际电影制作和视频制作的趋势，重点是那些尚未在美国发行的作品。多伦多国际电影节由比尔·马歇尔、亨克·范德科尔克和达斯迪·科尔创立，被认为是北美最重要、最负盛名的电影节，参加人数最多。
